java/liquibase/database/template/RowMapperResultSetExtractor.java

00001 package liquibase.database.template;
00002 
00003 import java.sql.ResultSet;
00004 import java.sql.SQLException;
00005 import java.util.ArrayList;
00006 import java.util.List;
00007 
00037 @SuppressWarnings({"unchecked"})
00038 class RowMapperResultSetExtractor implements ResultSetExtractor {
00039 
00040     private final RowMapper rowMapper;
00041 
00042     private final int rowsExpected;
00043 
00044 
00050     public RowMapperResultSetExtractor(RowMapper rowMapper) {
00051         this(rowMapper, 0);
00052     }
00053 
00061     public RowMapperResultSetExtractor(RowMapper rowMapper, int rowsExpected) {
00062         this.rowMapper = rowMapper;
00063         this.rowsExpected = rowsExpected;
00064     }
00065 
00066 
00067     public Object extractData(ResultSet rs) throws SQLException {
00068         List results = (this.rowsExpected > 0 ? new ArrayList(this.rowsExpected) : new ArrayList());
00069         int rowNum = 0;
00070         while (rs.next()) {
00071             results.add(this.rowMapper.mapRow(rs, rowNum++));
00072         }
00073         return results;
00074     }
00075 
00076 }
